Source.Name: zeitgeist
Source.Summary: Service which logs user activities and presents them to other applications
Kullanıcı aktivitelerini günlüğe kaydeden ve istendiğinde diğer uygulamalara sağlayan bir servis
Source.Description: Zeitgeist is a service which logs the users’ activities and events, anywhere from files opened to websites visited and conversations had. It makes this information readily available for other applications to use.

zeitgeist, kullanıcıların dosya açma, web sitesine girme ve çevrimiçi görüşmeler yapma gibi aktivitelerini ve olaylarını takip edip, günlük tutar. Gerektiğinde bu verileri diğer uygulamaların kullanımına sunar.

Package.Name: zeitgeist
Package.Summary: Service which logs user activities and presents them to other applications

Source.Name: python3-rdflib
Source.Description: python-rdflib is a Python library for working with RDF, a simple yet powerful language for representing information. The library contains parsers and serializers for RDF/XML, N3, NTriples, Turtle, TriX and RDFa.
